title: Bug splat  report details
body:
HAPPY NEW YEAR GUYS I need help :(

 I kept getting bug splat  like   I dont even get to  the loading screen   like league symbol black screen then bug splat  even at a custom game I kept bug splatting..   I uninstalled already,    ddu my  graphics card and installed it again still same thing.. help please :(

replies.body: These errors can happen when a driver, game file, or something else is failing to render the game.  I don't recommend trying out really old forum posts, but instead recommend going over the steps found in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.  That should do the trick!
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3571010 I already I tried this method too doesnt work
